entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Alerts do not display from ctor or OnAppearing when not in a NavPage/Shell #12970
  • AVFoundation Migration to .NET 7 Maui #12969
  • Additional iOS Keyboard Next Preference #12968
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Button background not appearing when setting Gradient and Shadow #12959
  • ApplyQueryAttributes when go back to one tab and two views is invoked in the wrong view #12957
  • Windows .NET MAUI App throws Exception when closing second window #12956
  • Using central package management causes build breaking NU1009 with MAUI projects #12953

Closed

  • OnRequest permission invoke on mainactivity shows warning as it supports only v23.0 and later #12764
  • LineBreakMode cannot be used on a button on Windows #10553
    Backlog
  • Button with Image on iOS and MacOS always missalign #8528
  • he program '[17988] myFirstMauiApp.exe' has exited with code 2147942405 (0x80070005) #12965
  • I'm not really clear on the status of this issue. Either way, this seems like more of a "how to" discussion than an actual issue in .NET MAUI. You definitely should be able to still use a custom splash screen. #12962
  • MAUI WebView on Android not loading Cesium static web page. #7191
    Backlog
  • Add a splash screen to a .NET MAUI app project on per-platform approaches #12917
  • Publish iOS app fails due to missing *.resources.dll files #12296
  • DllImport with .a file for iOS in MAUI #12675
  • Nested FlexLayout/BindableLayout Very Slow #12908
  • MAUI cannot get the length of the stream from FileSystem.OpenAppPackageFileAsync on Android #12776
  • code 2147942405 #12812
  • Maui for Windows freezes when resizing Entry control for email address #12377
    Backlog
  • [Custom Control] HotReload doesn't work for newly added nested items #11106
    Backlog
  • repro for Slider issues on Windows and macOS #9812 #11802
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Microsoft .Net Maui Toolkit Cannot resolve type EventToCommandBehavior #12642
  • [iOS][MacCatalyst] Grid layout calls Measure on its children way too many times #11140
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [Build] Mega pipeline net8 #12966
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Revert "[net8.0] Merge main into net8" #12964
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Mega pipeline #12963
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Try resolve the dotnet build crash on macos #12954
    do-not-merge
  • fix: Fixed nullable annotations for WeakEventManager. #12950
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Tizen] refactor splash updater #12897
    community ✨, partner/tizen
  • [net7.0] Fix password placeholder font issue on Android #12943
    area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] Add PublicAPI to the Graphics projects #12931
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8 #12803
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] dotnet format net70 #12958
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.5.1.1 to 1.6.0.1 #12841
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Palette from 1.0.0.15 to 1.0.0.16 #12838
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.7.0.1 to 1.7.0.2 #12840
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add more BlazorWebView device tests #12946
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.2.221209.1 to 1.2.230118.102 #12921
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Runtime from 2.5.3 to 2.5.3.1 #12844
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] Prevent mobile and lib templates from opening editors if in VS #12905
    area/templates 📄

Updated

  • Pre-compute Grid star values when possible #12912
    area/layout 🔲
  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Windows] Close the WebView2 disconnecting the Handler #12925
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
  • [Windows] Fix Button LineBreakMode property #10759
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Fix setting bottom tab icon title #12889
  • [iOS] Fix issue using SVG in SwipeItem Icon #12882
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Micro benchmark fixes #12178
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Update Essentials SMS API Docs #12849
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser from 1.4.0.3 to 1.4.0.4 #12847
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.5.1.1 to 2.5.1.2 #12842
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.SwipeRefreshLayout from 1.1.0.10 to 1.1.0.11 #12837
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • "Rename" Windows' Graphics APIs to match with the rest of the platforms #12818
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • Changes how propagate brushes changes #12714
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Android] Avoid to update Shell Toolbar colors if already disposed the Tracker #12539
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix crash setting SelectedTabColor on TabbedPage #12924
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/TabbedPage
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix Shell TitleView rendering issues on iOS 16 #12834
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, version/ios-16, control-titleview
  • Fix initial page and back button Navigation events #12348
    area/navigation 🧭
